summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1734, for the improvement of 5th Avenue Northeast from Maple Leaf Place to East 77th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks and wooden crosswalks, with all necessary appurtenances for the proper drainage, under Ordinance No. 18371 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
